I am pleased to announce {tidybayes} AND {ggdist} 2.1.1: I have split the {tidybayes} #rstats package in two! {tidybayes} will focus on bayes stuff, and {ggdist} on uncertainty vis

Read more on this (and other) changes here: https://t.co/8xaJ3txfXa

ggplot2 3.3.2 is now on CRAN. This is a patch release aimed at fixing regressions and issues in 3.3.0. It includes improvements to the bidirectional geom detection, moving of geom_density to the new contouring algorithm, and more. Thanks to the whole team for their work! #rstats

Slides for my #erum2020 talk are at https://t.co/EnH7jMc4ZJ
